methods.name: db_getHex
methods.desc: Returns binary data from the local database. (Deprecated and not supported, to be removed in a future version)
methods.returns: Data - The previously stored data

methods.name: db_getString
methods.desc: Returns string from the local database. (Deprecated and not supported, to be removed in a future version)
methods.returns: String - The previously stored string

methods.name: db_putHex
methods.desc: Stores binary data in the local database. (Deprecated and not supported, to be removed in a future version)
methods.returns: Boolean - `true` if the value was stored, otherwise `false`

methods.name: db_putString
methods.desc: Stores a string in the local database. (Deprecated and not supported, to be removed in a future version)
methods.returns: Boolean - `true` if the value was stored, otherwise `false`

methods.name: eth_accounts
methods.desc: Returns a list of addresses owned by client.
methods.returns: Array - 20 Bytes - addresses owned by the client

methods.name: eth_blockNumber
methods.desc: Returns the number of most recent block.
methods.returns: Quantity - integer of the current block number the client is on

methods.name: eth_call
methods.desc: Executes a new message call immediately without creating a transaction on the block chain.

details.data: Data - (optional) Hash of the method signature and encoded parameters. For details see [Ethereum Contract ABI](https://github.com/ethereum/wiki/wiki/Ethereum-Contract-ABI)
details.from: Address - (optional) 20 Bytes - The address the transaction is send from
details.gas: Quantity - (optional) Integer of the gas provided for the transaction execution. eth_call consumes zero gas, but this parameter may be needed by some executions
details.gasPrice: Quantity - (optional) Integer of the gasPrice used for each paid gas
details.to: Address - 20 Bytes  - The address the transaction is directed to
details.value: Quantity - (optional) Integer of the value send with this transaction

params: BlockNumber - integer block number, or the string `'latest'`, `'earliest'` or `'pending'`, see the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter)
methods.returns: Data - the return value of executed contract

methods.name: eth_coinbase
methods.desc: Returns the client coinbase address.
methods.returns: Address - The current coinbase address

methods.name: eth_compileLLL
methods.desc: Returns compiled LLL code.
methods.returns: Data - The compiled source code

methods.name: eth_compileSerpent
methods.desc: Returns compiled serpent code.
methods.returns: Data - The compiled source code

methods.name: eth_compileSolidity
methods.desc: Returns compiled solidity code.
methods.returns: Data - The compiled source code

methods.name: eth_estimateGas
methods.desc: Makes a call or transaction, which won't be added to the blockchain and returns the used gas, which can be used for estimating the used gas.
methods.returns: Quantity - The amount of gas used

methods.name: eth_fetchQueuedTransactions
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: eth_flush
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: eth_gasPrice
methods.desc: Returns the current price per gas in wei.
methods.returns: Quantity - integer of the current gas price in wei

methods.name: eth_getBalance
methods.desc: Returns the balance of the account of given address.
params: Address - 20 Bytes - address to check for balance
BlockNumber - integer block number, or the string `'latest'`, `'earliest'` or `'pending'`, see the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter)
methods.returns: Quantity - integer of the current balance in wei

methods.name: eth_getBlockByHash
methods.desc: Returns information about a block by hash.
params: Boolean - If `true` it returns the full transaction objects, if `false` only the hashes of the transactions

returns.desc: Object - A block object, or `null` when no block was found

details.difficulty: Quantity - integer of the difficulty for this block
details.extraData: Data - the 'extra data' field of this block
details.gasLimit: Quantity - the maximum gas allowed in this block
details.gasUsed: Quantity - the total used gas by all transactions in this block
details.hash: Hash - 32 Bytes - hash of the block. `null` when its pending block
details.logsBloom: Data - 256 Bytes - the bloom filter for the logs of the block. `null` when its pending block
details.miner: Address - 20 Bytes - the address of the beneficiary to whom the mining rewards were given
details.nonce: Data - 8 Bytes - hash of the generated proof-of-work. `null` when its pending block
details.number: Quantity - The block number. `null` when its pending block
details.parentHash: Hash - 32 Bytes - hash of the parent block
details.receiptsRoot: Data - 32 Bytes - the root of the receipts trie of the block
details.sha3Uncles: Data - 32 Bytes - SHA3 of the uncles data in the block
details.size: Quantity - integer the size of this block in bytes
details.stateRoot: Data - 32 Bytes - the root of the final state trie of the block
details.timestamp: Quantity - the unix timestamp for when the block was collated
details.totalDifficulty: Quantity - integer of the total difficulty of the chain until this block
details.transactions: Array - Array of transaction objects, or 32 Bytes transaction hashes depending on the last given parameter
details.transactionsRoot: Data - 32 Bytes - the root of the transaction trie of the block

methods.name: eth_getBlockByNumber
methods.desc: Returns information about a block by block number.
params: BlockNumber - integer of a block number, or the string `'earliest'`, `'latest'` or `'pending'`, as in the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter)
Boolean - If `true` it returns the full transaction objects, if `false` only the hashes of the transactions
methods.returns: See [eth_getBlockByHash](#eth_getblockbyhash)

methods.name: eth_getBlockTransactionCountByHash
methods.desc: Returns the number of transactions in a block from a block matching the given block hash.
params: Hash - 32 Bytes - hash of a block
methods.returns: Quantity - integer of the number of transactions in this block

methods.name: eth_getBlockTransactionCountByNumber
methods.desc: Returns the number of transactions in a block from a block matching the given block number.
params: BlockNumber - integer of a block number, or the string `'earliest'`, `'latest'` or `'pending'`, as in the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter)
methods.returns: Quantity - integer of the number of transactions in this block

methods.name: eth_getCode
methods.desc: Returns code at a given address.
params: BlockNumber - integer block number, or the string `'latest'`, `'earliest'` or `'pending'`, see the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter)
methods.returns: Data - the code from the given address

methods.name: eth_getCompilers
methods.desc: Returns a list of available compilers in the client.
methods.returns: Array - Array of available compilers

methods.name: eth_getFilterChanges
methods.desc: Polling method for a filter, which returns an array of logs which occurred since last poll.
methods.returns: Array - Array of log objects, or an empty array if nothing has changed since last poll

methods.name: eth_getFilterChangesEx
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: eth_getFilterLogs
methods.desc: Returns an array of all logs matching filter with given id.
methods.returns: See [eth_getFilterChanges](#eth_getfilterchanges)

methods.name: eth_getFilterLogsEx
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: eth_getLogs
methods.desc: Returns an array of all logs matching a given filter object.
params: Object - The filter object, see [eth_newFilter parameters](#eth_newfilter)
methods.returns: See [eth_getFilterChanges](#eth_getfilterchanges)

methods.name: eth_getLogsEx
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: eth_getStorageAt
methods.desc: Returns the value from a storage position at a given address.
params: Address - 20 Bytes - address of the storage
Quantity - integer of the position in the storage
BlockNumber - integer block number, or the string `'latest'`, `'earliest'` or `'pending'`, see the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter)
methods.returns: Data - the value at this storage position

methods.name: eth_getTransactionByBlockHashAndIndex
methods.desc: Returns information about a transaction by block hash and transaction index position.
params: Quantity - integer of the transaction index position
methods.returns: See [eth_getBlockByHash](#eth_gettransactionbyhash)

methods.name: eth_getTransactionByBlockNumberAndIndex
methods.desc: Returns information about a transaction by block number and transaction index position.
params: BlockNumber - a block number, or the string `'earliest'`, `'latest'` or `'pending'`, as in the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter)
methods.returns: See [eth_getBlockByHash](#eth_gettransactionbyhash)

methods.name: eth_getTransactionByHash
methods.desc: Returns the information about a transaction requested by transaction hash.
params: Hash - 32 Bytes - hash of a transaction

returns.desc: Object - A transaction object, or `null` when no transaction was found:

details.blockHash: Hash - 32 Bytes - hash of the block where this transaction was in. `null` when its pending.
details.blockNumber: BlockNumber - block number where this transaction was in. `null` when its pending.
details.from: Address - 20 Bytes - address of the sender.
details.gas: Quantity - gas provided by the sender.
details.gasPrice: Quantity - gas price provided by the sender in Wei.
details.hash: Hash - 32 Bytes - hash of the transaction.
details.input: Data - the data send along with the transaction.
details.nonce: Quantity - the number of transactions made by the sender prior to this one.
details.to: Address - 20 Bytes - address of the receiver. `null` when its a contract creation transaction.
details.transactionIndex: Quantity - integer of the transactions index position in the block. `null` when its pending.

methods.name: eth_getTransactionCount
methods.desc: Returns the number of transactions *sent* from an address.
params: BlockNumber - integer block number, or the string `'latest'`, `'earliest'` or `'pending'`, see the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter)
methods.returns: Quantity - integer of the number of transactions send from this address

methods.name: eth_getTransactionReceipt
methods.desc:
Returns the receipt of a transaction by transaction hash.
**Note** That the receipt is not available for pending transactions.

returns.desc: Object - A transaction receipt object, or `null` when no receipt was found:

details.blockHash: Hash - 32 Bytes - hash of the block where this transaction was in.
details.blockNumber: BlockNumber - block number where this transaction was in.
details.contractAddress: Address - 20 Bytes - The contract address created, if the transaction was a contract creation, otherwise `null`.
details.cumulativeGasUsed: Quantity - The total amount of gas used when this transaction was executed in the block.
details.gasUsed: Quantity - The amount of gas used by this specific transaction alone.
details.logs: Array - Array of log objects, which this transaction generated.
details.transactionHash: Hash - 32 Bytes - hash of the transaction.
details.transactionIndex: Quantity - integer of the transactions index position in the block.

methods.name: eth_getUncleByBlockHashAndIndex
methods.desc: Returns information about a uncle of a block by hash and uncle index position.
methods.returns: See [eth_getBlockByHash](#eth_getblockbyhash)

methods.name: eth_getUncleByBlockNumberAndIndex
methods.desc: Returns information about a uncle of a block by number and uncle index position.
params: BlockNumber - a block number, or the string `'earliest'`, `'latest'` or `'pending'`, as in the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter)
methods.returns: See [eth_getBlockByHash](#eth_getblockbyhash)

methods.name: eth_getUncleCountByBlockHash
methods.desc: Returns the number of uncles in a block from a block matching the given block hash.
params: Hash - 32 Bytes - hash of a block
methods.returns: Quantity - integer of the number of uncles in this block

methods.name: eth_getUncleCountByBlockNumber
methods.desc: Returns the number of uncles in a block from a block matching the given block number.
params: BlockNumber - integer of a block number, or the string 'latest', 'earliest' or 'pending', see the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter)
methods.returns: Quantity - integer of the number of uncles in this block

methods.name: eth_getWork
methods.desc: Returns the hash of the current block, the seedHash, and the boundary condition to be met ('target').
methods.returns: Array - Array with the following properties:

methods.name: eth_hashrate
methods.desc: Returns the number of hashes per second that the node is mining with.
methods.returns: Quantity - number of hashes per second

methods.name: eth_inspectTransaction
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: eth_mining
methods.desc: Returns `true` if client is actively mining new blocks.
methods.returns: Boolean - `true` of the client is mining, otherwise `false`

methods.name: eth_newBlockFilter
methods.desc:
Creates a filter in the node, to notify when a new block arrives.
To check if the state has changed, call [eth_getFilterChanges](#eth_getfilterchanges).
methods.returns: Quantity - A filter id

methods.name: eth_newFilter
methods.desc:
Creates a filter object, based on filter options, to notify when the state changes (logs).
To check if the state has changed, call [eth_getFilterChanges](#eth_getfilterchanges).

details.address: Address - (optional) 20 Bytes - Contract address or a list of addresses from which logs should originate.
details.fromBlock: BlockNumber - (optional) (default: latest) Integer block number, or `'latest'` for the last mined block or `'pending'`, `'earliest'` for not yet mined transactions.
details.toBlock: BlockNumber - (optional) (default: latest) Integer block number, or `'latest'` for the last mined block or `'pending'`, `'earliest'` for not yet mined transactions.
details.topics: Array - (optional) Array of 32 Bytes `DATA` topics. Topics are order-dependent. Each topic can also be an array of DATA with 'or' options.

methods.name: eth_newFilterEx
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: eth_newPendingTransactionFilter
methods.desc:
Creates a filter in the node, to notify when new pending transactions arrive.
To check if the state has changed, call [eth_getFilterChanges](#eth_getfilterchanges).
methods.returns: Quantity - A filter id

methods.name: eth_notePassword
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: eth_pendingTransactions
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: eth_protocolVersion
methods.desc: Returns the current ethereum protocol version.
methods.returns: String - The current ethereum protocol version

methods.name: eth_register
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: eth_sendRawTransaction
methods.desc: Creates new message call transaction or a contract creation for signed transactions.
methods.returns: Hash - 32 Bytes - the transaction hash, or the zero hash if the transaction is not yet available

methods.name: eth_sendTransaction
methods.desc: Creates new message call transaction or a contract creation, if the data field contains code.

details.data: Data - The compiled code of a contract OR the hash of the invoked method signature and encoded parameters. For details see [Ethereum Contract ABI](https://github.com/ethereum/wiki/wiki/Ethereum-Contract-ABI)
details.from: Address - 20 Bytes - The address the transaction is send from
details.gas: Quantity - (optional) (default: 90000) Integer of the gas provided for the transaction execution. It will return unused gas.
details.gasPrice: Quantity - (optional) (default: To-Be-Determined) Integer of the gasPrice used for each paid gas
details.nonce: Quantity - (optional) Integer of a nonce. This allows to overwrite your own pending transactions that use the same nonce.
details.to: Address - 20 Bytes - (optional when creating new contract) The address the transaction is directed to
details.value: Quantity - (optional) Integer of the value send with this transaction

methods.returns: Hash - 32 Bytes - the transaction hash, or the zero hash if the transaction is not yet available

methods.name: eth_sign
methods.desc:
Signs data with a given address.
**Note** the address to sign must be unlocked.
methods.returns: Data - Signed data

methods.name: eth_signTransaction
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: eth_submitHashrate
methods.desc: Used for submitting mining hashrate.
params: Data - a hexadecimal string representation (32 bytes) of the hash rate
String - A random hexadecimal(32 bytes) ID identifying the client
methods.returns: Boolean - `true` if submitting went through succesfully and `false` otherwise

methods.name: eth_submitWork
methods.desc: Used for submitting a proof-of-work solution.
params: Data - 8 Bytes - The nonce found (64 bits)
Data - 32 Bytes - The header's pow-hash (256 bits)
Data - 32 Bytes - The mix digest (256 bits)
methods.returns: Boolean - `true` if the provided solution is valid, otherwise `false`

methods.name: eth_syncing
methods.desc: Returns an object with data about the sync status or `false`.

returns.desc: Object - An object with sync status data or `FALSE`, when not syncing

details.currentBlock: Quantity - The current block, same as eth_blockNumber
details.startingBlock: Quantity - The block at which the import started (will only be reset, after the sync reached his head)

methods.name: eth_uninstallFilter
methods.desc:
Uninstalls a filter with given id. Should always be called when watch is no longer needed.
Additonally Filters timeout when they aren't requested with [eth_getFilterChanges](#eth_getfilterchanges) for a period of time.
methods.returns: Boolean - `true` if the filter was successfully uninstalled, otherwise `false`

methods.name: eth_unregister
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: ethcore_acceptNonReservedPeers
methods.returns: Boolean - ?

methods.name: ethcore_addReservedPeer
methods.returns: Boolean - ?

methods.name: ethcore_defaultExtraData
methods.desc: Returns the default extra data
methods.returns: Data - Extra data

methods.name: ethcore_devLogs
methods.desc: Returns latest logs of your node
methods.returns: Array - Development logs

methods.name: ethcore_devLogsLevels
methods.desc: Returns current log level settings
methods.returns: String - undefined

methods.name: ethcore_dropNonReservedPeers
methods.returns: Boolean - ?

methods.name: ethcore_extraData
methods.desc: Returns currently set extra data
methods.returns: Data - Extra data

methods.name: ethcore_gasFloorTarget
methods.desc: Returns current target for gas floor
methods.returns: Quantity - Gas Floor Target

methods.name: ethcore_minGasPrice
methods.desc: Returns currently set minimal gas price
methods.returns: Quantity - Minimal Gas Price

methods.name: ethcore_netChain
methods.desc: Returns the name of the connected chain.
methods.returns: String - chain name

methods.name: ethcore_netMaxPeers
methods.desc: Returns maximal number of peers.
methods.returns: Quantity - Maximal number of peers

methods.name: ethcore_netPort
methods.desc: Returns network port the node is listening on.
methods.returns: Quantity - Port Number

methods.name: ethcore_nodeName
methods.desc: Returns node name (identity)
methods.returns: String - Node name

methods.name: ethcore_removeReservedPeer
methods.returns: Boolean - ?

methods.name: ethcore_rpcSettings
methods.desc: Returns basic settings of rpc (enabled, port, interface).
methods.returns: Object - JSON object containing rpc settings

methods.name: ethcore_setAuthor
methods.desc: Changes author (coinbase) for mined blocks.
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: ethcore_setExtraData
methods.desc: Changes extra data for newly mined blocks
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: ethcore_setGasFloorTarget
methods.desc: Changes current gas floor target.
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: ethcore_setMinGasPrice
methods.desc: Changes minimal gas price for transaction to be accepted to the queue.
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: ethcore_setTransactionsLimit
methods.desc: Changes limit for transactions in queue.
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: ethcore_transactionsLimit
methods.desc: Changes limit for transactions in queue.
methods.returns: Quantity - Current max number of transactions in queue

methods.name: ethcore_unsignedTransactionsCount
methods.desc: Returns number of unsigned transactions when running with Trusted Signer. Error otherwise
methods.returns: Quantity - Number of unsigned transactions

methods.name: net_listening
methods.desc: Returns `true` if client is actively listening for network connections.
methods.returns: Boolean - `true` when listening, otherwise `false`.

methods.name: net_peerCount
methods.desc: Returns number of peers currenly connected to the client.
methods.returns: Quantity - Integer of the number of connected peers

methods.name: net_version
methods.desc: Returns the current network protocol version.
methods.returns: String - The current network protocol version

methods.name: personal_listAccounts
methods.desc: Returns a list of addresses owned by client.
methods.returns: Array - 20 Bytes addresses owned by the client.

methods.name: personal_newAccount
methods.desc: Creates new account
methods.returns: Address - The created address

methods.name: personal_signAndSendTransaction
methods.desc: Sends and signs a transaction given account passphrase. Does not require the account to be unlocked nor unlocks the account for future transactions.

details.data: Data - The compiled code of a contract OR the hash of the invoked method signature and encoded parameters. For details see [Ethereum Contract ABI](https://github.com/ethereum/wiki/wiki/Ethereum-Contract-ABI)
details.from: Address - 20 Bytes - The address the transaction is send from
details.gas: Quantity - (optional) (default: 90000) Integer of the gas provided for the transaction execution. It will return unused gas
details.gasPrice: Quantity - (optional) (default: To-Be-Determined) Integer of the gasPrice used for each paid gas
details.nonce: Quantity - (optional) Integer of a nonce. This allows to overwrite your own pending transactions that use the same nonce.
details.to: Address - 20 Bytes - (optional when creating new contract) The address the transaction is directed to
details.value: Quantity - (optional) Integer of the value send with this transaction

methods.returns: Data - 32 Bytes - the transaction hash, or the zero hash if the transaction is not yet available

methods.name: personal_signerEnabled
methods.desc: Returns whether signer is enabled/disabled.
methods.returns: Boolean - true when enabled, false when disabled

methods.name: personal_unlockAccount
methods.returns: Boolean - whether the call was successful

methods.name: shh_addToGroup
params: Data - 60 Bytes - The identity address to add to a group (?)
methods.returns: Boolean - `true` if the identity was successfully added to the group, otherwise `false` (?)

methods.name: shh_getFilterChanges
methods.desc:
Polling method for whisper filters. Returns new messages since the last call of this method.
**Note** calling the [shh_getMessages](#shh_getmessages) method, will reset the buffer for this method, so that you won't receive duplicate messages.
methods.returns: Array - Array of messages received since last poll

methods.name: shh_getMessages
methods.desc: Get all messages matching a filter. Unlike `shh_getFilterChanges` this returns all messages.
methods.returns: See [shh_getFilterChanges](#shh_getfilterchanges)

methods.name: shh_hasIdentity
methods.desc: Checks if the client hold the private keys for a given identity.
params: Data - 60 Bytes - The identity address to check
methods.returns: Boolean - `true` if the client holds the privatekey for that identity, otherwise `false`

methods.name: shh_newFilter
methods.desc: Creates filter to notify, when client receives whisper message matching the filter options.

details.to: Data - (optional) 60 Bytes - Identity of the receiver. *When present it will try to decrypt any incoming message if the client holds the private key to this identity.*
details.topics: Array - Array of `DATA` topics which the incoming message's topics should match.  You can use the following combinations

methods.returns: Quantity - The newly created filter

methods.name: shh_newGroup
methods.returns: Data - 60 Bytes - the address of the new group. (?)

methods.name: shh_newIdentity
methods.desc: Creates new whisper identity in the client.
methods.returns: Data - 60 Bytes - the address of the new identiy

methods.name: shh_post
methods.desc: Sends a whisper message.

details.from: Data - (optional) 60 Bytes - The identity of the sender
details.payload: Data - The payload of the message
details.priority: Quantity - The integer of the priority in a rang from ... (?)
details.to: Data - (optional) 60 Bytes - The identity of the receiver. When present whisper will encrypt the message so that only the receiver can decrypt it
details.topics: Array - Array of `DATA` topics, for the receiver to identify messages
details.ttl: Quantity - Integer of the time to live in seconds.

methods.returns: Boolean - `true` if the message was send, otherwise `false`

methods.name: shh_uninstallFilter
methods.desc:
Uninstalls a filter with given id. Should always be called when watch is no longer needed.
Additonally Filters timeout when they aren't requested with [shh_getFilterChanges](#shh_getfilterchanges) for a period of time.
methods.returns: Boolean - `true` if the filter was successfully uninstalled, otherwise `false`

methods.name: shh_version
methods.desc: Returns the current whisper protocol version.
methods.returns: String - The current whisper protocol version

methods.name: trace_block
methods.desc: Returns traces created at given block
params: BlockNumber - Integer block number, or 'latest' for the last mined block or 'pending', 'earliest' for not yet mined transactions
methods.returns: Array - Block traces

methods.name: trace_filter
methods.desc: Returns traces matching given filter
methods.returns: Array - Traces matching given filter

methods.name: trace_get
methods.desc: Returns trace at given position.
methods.returns: Object - Trace object

methods.name: trace_transaction
methods.desc: Returns all traces of given transaction
methods.returns: Array - Traces of given transaction

methods.name: web3_clientVersion
methods.desc: Returns the current client version.
methods.returns: String - The current client version

methods.name: web3_sha3
methods.desc: Returns Keccak-256 (*not* the standardized SHA3-256) of the given data.
params: String - The data to convert into a SHA3 hash
methods.returns: Data - The SHA3 result of the given string
